UseCase.Summary:
Used to authenticate and identify the user with the web
application.

Preconditions.Precondition: The user's information must exist in the DBMS.

InitializationSteps.InitializationStep: The user navigates to the main web page.

ProcessSteps.ProcessStep: The user enters his/her email address in the Email field.
The user enters his/her password in the Password field.
The user clicks on the Submit icon.

The SuD validates that the email address and password
have been entered.
The SuD queries the User Table for the user credentials.

The SuD creates an instance of a User object stores it in the
Session State.

The SuD displays the message "Welcome, User Name" in place of
the login fields.

TerminationSteps.TerminationStep: The SuD updates the user menu with appropriate menu options.

Exceptions.Exception:
Either the email address or password has not been entered. The
SuD redisplays the web page with an error indicating the missing
field.

The SuD cannot validate the user credentials. The SuD
redirects the user to an error page indicating the information
that is incorrect.

Postconditions.Postcondition: A valid user object has been stored to the Session State.
The proper menu is displayed for the user.

Issue.Title: Need to add fields to User Table
Issue.Description:
Need to add fields for the user's email address and
password to the user table along with the appropriate indexes.

Comment.CommentText:
Added the requested fields to the user table
definition.

Assumptions.Assumption:
All users who access the system will have access
to a web browser.

UseCase.Summary:
Process used to recover a lost user password. The
password is reset and then sent via email.

Preconditions.Precondition: The user must have an account on the System.

InitializationSteps.InitializationStep:
The user has entered an invalid password and has clicked
on the link to retrieve a lost password.

ProcessSteps.ProcessStep:
The user enters his/her email address and clicks on
the submit icon.
The SuD looks up the email address.
The user clicks on the Submit icon.
The SuD generates a new password.
The SuD updates the user's record in the User Table
The SuD emails the new password to the user.

TerminationSteps.TerminationStep:
The SuD has found the user and sent a new password
to the user.

Exceptions.Exception:
The user did not enter an email address. The SuD
redisplays the web page with an error indicating the field is
required.

The SuD could not find the email address entered. The SuD
redisplays the web page with an error page indicating the email
address was not found.

Postconditions.Postcondition: The user's password has been set to a temporary password and it has been emailed to the user.

Assumptions.Assumption:
All users who access the system will have access to a
web browser.
